Summary: We have had this time-share for more than 40-years.  Laguna shores has become tired and worn.  My companion broke her leg in September and walks with a cane.  Laguna Shores is a nightmare for a handicapped person.  The second flat to which we were assigned had 21-steps to reach the door.  No elevator.  No handicapped parking.  Lots of step all around.  The staff are cuckholds to a mysterious "manager" who never appeared.  None of the staff was empowered to do, literally, anything.  If there was a problem such as problems with the sole electric wall heater, we were told to fill out a form to be submitted to the Board of Directors.  Even moving the furniture in the flat required the acquiescence of the equally mysterious Board of Directors.  If you stay at Laguna Shores, get in
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us. We appreciate your feedback!

Summary: I would have given this one star if it wasn't facing Hesler Patk and the ocean. The building is old and badly needs refurbishing. The toilet smells probably from old plumbing and there's even an old heater on the wall. It's clean though. But very crowded with the bed, couch, chair, table for 4 for a studio for 4. It has a full kitchen though. The upper units (except for one) have no balconies so you have to get out of the condo every day. The couch sofa bed is not comfortable at all. The bed was still the old spring loaded bed which is very uncomfortable and creeks when you get in and out of bed. One of the receptionist said they have changed some  mattress but not in all the rooms. I asked for a change and it didn't happen. I had to call again the next day and was told that the
Room tip: First floor rooms facing the park with a common patio.  Get the room where there is an accordion...
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to bring up your concerns. We have shared your comments with the onsite resort management in an effort to improve guest experiences. Your feedback is valuable to us.

Summary: Beautiful ocean view with the multi tiered window. Easy access to everything around and a great bicycle friendly roads.  Wonderful staff with tons of free movies to occupy the night with. Great view from Top Of The World site.
Manager Response: What a wonderful review, it certainly sounds like you had a great time. We hope to see you again soon!

Summary: An older building for sure but they do well with providing all the basics. We were here for the week and loved it. The location is amazing! Some of the most beautiful beaches in the world right across the street! We walked every day to different coves, around the park and to downtown Laguna. Logan and the staff are great. The jacuzzi and pool were open and clean/fun. The grounds are kept nice and while the parking is tight, it is free! Expect it to be loud; between the ocean and cars (it is a VERY popular area) it is NOT quiet. We would stay again!
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing our resort as your vacation getaway. We value your opinion. It would be great to have the opportunity to serve you again.

Summary: Great location, everything is in walking distance. Lawn bowling is across the street if you know someone who is a member, it's a lot of fun. Hotel only offers one parking space so we had to park our second car a few blocks away otherwise the parking meter is $10 every 4 hours during the day, free overnight parking :) Pull down bed is not the best in comfort and studio is small but very clean and the staff is great.
Manager Response: Thanks for a wonderful review and rating! It really pleases us to know you enjoyed the resort, your accommodations and the location of the resort. Come back soon!

Summary Heading: Quality at a fair price for “The good life”
Summary: We have seen older reviews, and negative reviews. This find by the sea needs new positive reviews.  The on property management and staff were friendly, caring, and very good at their jobs.  Yes the property is dated but nothing is wrong with age if it’s maintained, and housekeeping is of the highest quality.  We stayed as renting guests at this time share and treated as owners.  The address may be North Coast Highway buf it is on Cliff dr in the middle of “Heisler Park. When they say “location, location, they are talking about this area.  We were concerned about our murphy bed unit and the parking facilities. Both were not a problem at all. We found the bed easy to use and comfortable. The parking was not a problem at all.  After coming to Laguna Beach for 4 decades we feel we
Room tip: Tell the hotel or time share exchange exactly what you like and you may get better. We did.
Manager Response: Wow! Thank you for the five star rating! Come back and visit us again soon.

Summary: We love Laguna Shores!  It's an outdated, little gem with a location across from beautiful Heisler Park and a few blocks from Main Beach and the center of town.  There is a free trolley throughout Laguna with a stop just outside the door for both the Southbound and Northbound directions.  The rooms all have a full kitchen with access to shared BBQs.  There's also a pool, hot tub, laundry facilities and parking.  The staff is friendly and helpful.
Room tip: Any ocean view rooms are great!
Manager Response: Thank you for providing us with a review on your stay! We are pleased you liked the location of the resort and thought our staff was friendly. We hope you come back again soon!

Summary: This resort is a very well-cared-for, clean, comfortable resort.  The pool and jacuzzi were sparkling clean and we really enjoyed using them.  The resort is relatively small which made it a nice, cozy, peaceful resort to stay at.  It has an excellent location being almost right on the beach with the beach and all of Laguna's art galleries, shops and restaurants in easy walking distance   Our room slept 4; however, it was a bit of a tight squeeze.  Our room had a gorgeous view of the ocean but the layout of the room was such that when we opened the sofa bed at night, there was absolutely no room to get around the bed to get to the other side of the room, so if you are planning on sharing a room that sleeps 4, be prepared for it to be a bit small.  But for such a small room, the
Manager Response: We’re happy to have earned a 5 star rating! We are always happy to learn that our guests enjoyed our accommodations, amenities, and location. We hope you will come back and visit us again.

Summary: Great property close to the beach and ocean with very nice county park across the street.  Property is >50 years old, but well maintained.  Studio units are very small with a Murphy bed, but adequate for two guests. Larger units are sometimes available, but most are booked well in advance by owners. Lots to see and do in the area.
Manager Response: We’re happy to have earned a 5 star rating!  We are always happy to learn that our guests enjoyed our accommodations, amenities, and location. We hope you will come back and visit us again.

Summary: This is our second time staying at this little gem (a motel converted to a timeshare in the long past) and we actually ended up in the same unit twice!  What are the odds?  Our unit was a "Capitan" meaning a studio with a pull-down bed.  Each of these units has a slightly different layout but the Commodore and Admiral units will be significantly larger and with separate sleeping arrangements.   Our unit had a full kitchen, a marginal bathroom, a large-ish closet, and a multi-purpose living and sleeping area.  The pull down murphy bed is close to the ground and takes a little gymnastic ability to get to a standing position upon rising.  It was a major negative for us but not enough to deter us from returning.  The complex itself is pleasant, the laundry room does not charge for
Manager Response: We appreciate your comments about your stay with Laguna Shores. Thank you for informing us about the areas of our resort that were an inconvenience to you. This will assist us in making continuous improvements to our resort. It pleases us to hear that you thought our staff was very friendly and we are always happy to learn that our owners and guests enjoyed our convenient location. We hope that you continue to make many more memories in the years to come. We look forward to your next visit!

Summary: This is the best location in Laguna Beach! It is right next to the beautiful Heisler Park and walking distance to town. The condos have nice kitchens and balconies to view the Pacific Ocean. Free wifi, laundry and popcorn!
Manager Response: Thank you very much for your review. We are always happy to learn that our guests enjoyed our accommodations and amenities. We look forward to your next stay soon!

Summary: I booked this place to stay with myself and my 2 kids age 9 and 13. We got the unit facing the side street. We had a van parked in front of our door one night with someone sleeping in it. I could get over the fact that there was absolutely no view whatsoever but there are a couple things I couldn't get over. I felt the woman at the front desk was very curt, unwelcoming and borderline rude. I also see other reviews complaining about tight parking. How about NO parking. (Photos attached- Note the date on the pass I received). I asked the front desk about parking and was told to park on a city street in a neighborhood a few blocks away. Apparently this is where non metered parking is. I pleaded with them to please let me use a spot they had on site because I was going to dinner and
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to review our property. While it seems your stay was less than satisfactory, we urge to not let this experience sway your decision in booking with us again. Your particular unit, The Jasmine, unfortunately is 1 of only 2 rooms on property that do not come with a guaranteed parking spot. This is outlined on our website when you’re booking your reservation. With that said, if we know for certain that there is an open space available we’ll be happy to give it to you. The particular time period you were here, we were a full house. You did stay over a Friday which is our big turn-over day so it may have looked as though there were lots of open spots after everyone checked out when in fact all those spots were assigned to everyone checking in later that day. With respects to the way you were treated at check in time, that is absolutely unacceptable and our front desk has received counsel on this point. In the future, it may be beneficial for you to call the resort to book instead of booking online. This way you’ll have a better idea of what all is entailed with respects to parking, room location, room amenities etc. Thanks again for your comments and we hope to hear from you soon.  Laguna Shores Management

Summary Heading: Enjoy staying at this property in Laguna Beach
Summary: At this small historic resort we had a studio room on the second floor.  My room was a corner room and was ocean facing and the view was wonderful.  There was a very large window facing the park and the ocean with a table and chairs right in front of the window.  There was a second window in the main living area which made the room so bright.  The room is small with a murphy bed, but it does have a full kitchen.  This room did not have a balcony and I did miss not having one.  I did have a issue during my stay here, but I relayed my concern to the people at the front desk and I felt they took my concern seriously.  I also had a problem at the roof top parking.  Parking is very tight and you have to be very careful with parking and driving up and down the ramp. My friend and I
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to provide us a review of your stay. Thank you for bringing up your concerns. We apologize for any inconvenience you may have experience. Your input is welcomed as it provides us an opportunity to hear our guests' concerns and make improvements to enhance their overall satisfaction. We are happy to hear that you would consider returning. And of course, you are always welcome at Laguna Shores as well.  Laguna Shores Management

Summary: The wife and I need to get away from the daily rush of our lives and need to spend some quality time together. The property was awesome. We were across from the beach park and within walking distance from downtown, restaurants, and the local grocery store. The property provide swimming pool, spa, laundry facilities, gas barbecue as well as WiFi. Property is secured and several of the rooms have a small balcony with chairs to enjoy the sunset. This property is a winner.
Manager Response: We appreciate you taking the time to provide us with a review of your stay. It always thrills us to hear that our guests enjoy our accommodations and had a great time. We couldn’t agree with you more that our location is terrific. Thank you for staying with us. We look forward to your next visit.  Laguna Shores Management

Summary: Lovely beach. Nice atmosphere. Good stores and nice art scene. Overall a great tourist destination. Parking can be hard to find. Plan for traffic. The cliff is a nice Restuarant with beach views.  Xxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxx
Manager Response: We appreciate your feedback regarding your stay with us. We are pleased to learn that you enjoyed our accommodations and amenities.   Laguna Shores Management

Summary: So fabulous, can't even say enough about this historic resort. It is a timeshare now, since the 1970's but was built in the 1930's as a hotel and apartment complex. It had  been remodeled and updated and continues to be.  Management is very well organized, staff is great, and maintenance and housekeeping are so responsive.        Most of the rooms are studios but they vary in size and arrangement; some have the ocean views, which ours did.  We would love to return.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to provide us a glowing review of your stay. We are happy to hear you had a great time. We are glad you enjoyed our accommodations and were pleased with our customer service. It is our goal to provide the highest level of customer service and guest satisfaction. We look forward to your next stay.  Laguna Shores Management

Summary: This is my third stay at this small, cozy and wonderfully located resort. I really enjoy staying here.  I stayed in an ocean front room with Heisler Park and the beach just across the street. From my patio facing the ocean I can sit and relax when not out and about or I could watch the sunset in the evening.  The rooms at Laguna Shores are quite small.  My room had a murphy bed, which I know is not for everyone. The kitchens are fully equipped. There are gas grills in the pool area as well as tables and chairs if you wish to eat there. They also have a hot tub on property. The staff at the front desk are helpful and friendly.  I will be returning to this resort again.
Manager Response: We appreciate you taking the time to provide us with a review of your stay. We are happy that you enjoyed your accommodations and your frequent visits to our resort. We are happy to hear that you enjoyed our accommodations, customer service and our location. We look forward to your next visit.   Laguna Shores Management

Summary: We are owners and try to use the property once a year.  Rooms are well maintained and comfortable.  You are right across from the shoreline.  From some of the units, you can literally lie in bed and watch the dolphins jumping in the water, looking through the large windows.  Rooms are not very large, but comfortable. Almost like a bachelor studio.  Staff is wonderful.  But, be there before 8:00 pm.  That is when the office closes.  You have assigned parking.  Some of the spaces can be a bit challenging.  If you must park on the roof, it can be a little intimidating going up and down the ramp and making the sharp turn.  You are within walking distance to the main beach and shopping, restaurants, downtown.  Nice, relaxing atmosphere.
Manager Response: We appreciate you taking the time to provide us your feedback. Thank you for bringing up your concerns. Your input is welcomed as it provides us an opportunity to hear our guests' concerns and make improvements to enhance their overall satisfaction.

Summary Heading: Great Location, Excellent Service, Best Place to Stay
Summary: I grew up in Laguna Beach, so finding a place to stay I was very particular with many details.  The Laguna Shores was better than what I was expecting.  They run this facility like a family ran business.  The service is excellent.  They serve popcorn in the afternoons, and a morning coffee, and some mornings even had other treats out.  The location is perfect for getting to all the main attractions but yet far enough away from the Hwy 1 so the traffic is not an issue.   They have discount tickets available for the festivals and other area businesses. The movie rentals came in handy too.  Great place to stay to have a home away from home experience.  All the other guess were so friendly that we enjoyed our stay so much that I can not wait to go back.  This location is also a
Manager Response: We appreciate you taking the time to provide us your feedback. We are delighted that you retuned to your hometown. It always thrills us to hear that our guests enjoy our accommodations and had a great time. We couldn’t agree with you more that our location is perfect.  It is our goal to provide the highest level of customer service and guest satisfaction. Thank you for your recommendation. We look forward to your next visit.

Summary: I really enjoyed my recent stay here at Laguna Shores! All around Great experience. Great Location conveniently located near a park that overlooks the ocean. Great walking distance to everything the beach, the ocean cliffs, shopping and restaurants. The property clean and gated I felt safe enough to leave my window open at night. The room was like a little apartment with a full kitchen, dining area, little front room, Murphy bed and ample storage space. The unit was very clean, shower big and toiletries provided. There is a TV with a DVD & Video Player. Pool and Jacuzzi. I would also like to compliment Bryan at the front desk he was very welcoming and willing to answer any questions I had about the area. He provided great recommendations on restaurants! Free internet too.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to provide us a glowing review of your stay. We are delighted that you returned. We are happy to hear you had a great time. We are glad you enjoyed our accommodations and were pleased with our customer service. It is our goal to provide the highest level of customer service and guest satisfaction. Thank you for the recommendation. We look forward to your next visit.   Laguna Shores Management

Summary: Nice accommodations. The friendly staff meet all our needs. Meet beautiful people and dined out side in one of the many patio areas. The view was amazing and the location was prime. I highly recommend this place.
Manager Response: We appreciate you taking the time to provide us with a review of your stay. We are happy to hear that you enjoyed our accommodations, customer service with our location. We look forward to your next visit.  Laguna Shores Management

Summary: This Time Share has recently been updated and the interiors look great.  Almost every room has an Ocean View.  It's within walking distance to Downtown Laguna Beach restaurants, shops and Main Beach.  Las Brisas Mexican Restaurant is just a short 2 minutes walk and is a great place to eat, breakfast buffets, lunch or dinner with amazing views as well.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to provide us a review of your stay. We are happy to hear you had a great time. We are glad you enjoyed our accommodations and were pleased with our location. We look forward to your next visit.

Summary Heading: A great place to vacation near the ocean with a beautiful park to walk in and beaches to enjoy.
Summary: We love staying at Laguna Shores -- they take a lot of care to make your time wonderful. There's a lot of attention to what guests want.  And the location s terrific. You can walk to most places in Laguna or, equally fine, take the free Trolley :)
Manager Response: We appreciate you taking the time to provide us with a review of your stay. It always thrills us to hear that our guests enjoy our accommodations and had a great time. We couldn’t agree with you more that our location is terrific. Thank you for staying with us. We look forward to your next visit.

Summary Heading: A return trip to Laguna Shores
Summary: This is my second time to stay at the Laguna Shores. It is such a relaxing, inviting and welcoming place to stay.  As stated before the location is superb with a park and the beach right across the street.  The people at this resort are so helpful, kind and courteous.  This is a small, lovely resort with a pool and hot tub and does not have an on site restaurant.  I know many people today are looking to stay at the mega resorts, but this suits me just fine.  My room was small but nicely decorated and had recently been updated. I do like the full kitchen, it has every thing one needs.  While I was here the resort put on a game day party, with game day bingo, and prizes too. No Charge! They had a lot of food, snacks and drinks.  It was a good party and I appreciate what they did
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to provide us a glowing review of your stay. We are delighted that you returned. We are happy to hear you had a great time. We are glad you enjoyed our accommodations and were pleased with our customer service. It is our goal to provide the highest level of customer service and guest satisfaction. Thank you for the recommendation. We look forward to your next visit.   Laguna Shores Management

Summary Heading: Million dollar views in a premier location iin Laguna Beach
Summary: Laguna Shores was a great find in Laguna Beach .. Our suite was newly renovated , clean and comfortable. The ocean view is fabulous and we can walk out the gate to Heisler park . The front desk staff are excellent and Mark the manager has been very knowledgable and helpful. A very nice touch was Mark hosting a welcoming continental breakfast on Saturday morning  with all guests , followed by his taking us on a walking tour of the main beach and onto the farmers market . We will be back !
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to provide us a glowing review of your stay. We are happy to hear you had a great time. We are glad you enjoyed our accommodations and were pleased with our customer service. We look forward to your next visit.  Laguna Shores Management

Summary Heading: Clean rooms + full kitchen + helpful staff & family atmosphere = better than a hotel for our anniversary.
Summary: We appreciated the friendly staff, great ocean view from our room, the full kitchen (we are budget-conscious, and cooked half our meals so we could splurge a couple nights) and jacuzzi, which we used almost every day. We would definitely go back.
Manager Response: Thank you for your kind words! We’re so glad that we were able to share and assist in this special time with your wife and you. We pride ourselves on having beautiful rooms and the friendliest staff in town! We invite you to come back next year (or sooner!) and make Laguna Shores an anniversary tradition! Happy belated Anniversary!  Laguna Shores Management

Summary: My wife and I recently stayed at Laguna Shores Resort in Laguna Beach over Christmas.   It offered us a fanatastic vacation and a chance to visit grandkids every day in nearby Huntington Beach.   What a find for us.    The locale was superb.  Park on the roof lot, walk 50 feet and we are in the room.    We were within close walking distance to beautiful Heisler Park, a stairway to the ocean, shopping in downtown Laguna Beach,  Laguna Art Museum, and numerous art galleries all connected by walking paths.  Tremendous views!  The history of this quaint place goes back to the 1930's. It still retains that early charm yet it is very modernized.  Rooms are small by today's hotel room standards yet they are very efficiently designed and easy to live in.  We loved it.  Also a shout out
Manager Response: We couldn’t have asked for a better review and overview of what we stand for! Thank you for your feedback, it’s very much appreciated. We’re so glad you were able to enjoy all the wonderful amenities we and all of Laguna Beach have to offer. It was a pleasure to take you downtown and to the farmers market, I thoroughly enjoyed our conversations and hearing about your sailing! Hope to see you again next year if not sooner.  Laguna Shores Management

Summary: This is probably my favorite studio that I have stayed in - the queen size murphy bed really allows for the unit to seem very spacious indeed - and the location really is special.  Heisler Park, adjacent to the property, overlooks and runs down to the ocean in the center of Laguna.  My unit does not have an ocean view, but some of the units do.  The unit does have a full kitchen, and daily housekeeping. The Tri Com Management staff are VERY helpful as well.  While others have noted the noise level, it does not seem to be a problem for me.  I do wish there was an exercise room on site to go with the pool and hot tub, and that the studio had a tub to go along with the really nice and large shower, but how'd that Stones song go?  (Oh yeah, "You can't always get what you want,").  I
Manager Response: Your comments nearly mirror my sentiments about our property and area. Heisler Park truly is the gem of Laguna and we’re honored to be right next to it and in such close proximity of so many wonderful attractions! I like to describe Laguna Shores as a “boutique timeshare” because it’s small, quaint and charming with lots of history. With the original construction having taken place in the 1930’s there was a lot of modern day wants and needs that weren’t taken into consideration but we’re doing our best to keep abreast with the 21st century. You know, the next line to that song is …”but if you try sometime…” Keep trying! We hope to see you back at Laguna Shores in the near future!  Laguna Shores Management

Summary: My husband and I spent a wonderful weekend at the Laguna Shores. We had a quiet and restful time.  We walked along the beach at sunset and sat on our patio which over looked the ocean.  We walked into town through all the quaint stores ate at some very nice resturants.  We are looking forward to staying there again next year and this time for the whole week.  We split the week up between our 2 children who used the remainder of the week.  They seem to enjoy the peace and quiet of the resort.
Manager Response: We’re so glad you enjoyed your time at Laguna Shores! On my down time I find myself doing a lot of walking around Laguna Beach as well. It’s amazing how many hidden gems you can find just by taking a leisurely stroll around our village. We encourage you to get with our knowledgeable front desk staff that have grown up in and around the community to find places like these. Hope to see you soon at our tranquil timeshare by the tide!  Laguna Shores Management

Summary: Laguna Shores has all the potential to be a first rate hotel, for most of the rooms. Un - fortunately,  our room was not one of them.  The location cannot be beat as it is ½ block to the water.  Located on Coast Highway, the insulation of the walls and single pane windows don’t help the noise level.  You walked out or our entry door and you were on the side walk.  The toilet you had to hold down the handle to get it to flush.  Furnishings were late 1960,s. Parking for our unit was on the street at a meter that cost $2.50 an hour or $25.00 a day (SO MUCH FOR FREE PARKING).  On the good side, you have everything a party of 2 would need, if you were a 1960 minimalist. The bed was great and we had a good night sleep.  Service was excellent  Will we go back, maybe, but not to room
Manager Response: none

Summary: I can't begin to explain how amazing then ocean view rooms are! Friendly service and a great price for the location and level of quality. Great job!! The rooms themselves are fully furnished, and great great cooking space. Definitely worth a second trip!  Thank you!!
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: Wonderful Location for this Laguna Beach Resort
Summary: This resort is a small but inviting resort in Laguna Beach.  The location is excellent.  Beautiful Heisler Park and the ocean is right across the street.  Our check in process went smoothly and quickly.   The rooms are quite small & could use some updating, but they are very clean.  We had a full kitchen in our room and it was nicely done.  We did not like the location of our room, we where near the street and there is alot of street noise, and we did not have a ocean view.  That was disappointing.  The parking at this resort is also quite challenging. The landscaping and flowers are well maintained & lovely. Housekeeping does an excellent job. Most of the people working at the resort are very friendly and helpful.  Despite the disappointments, we would return to this resort
Manager Response: We appreciate you taking the time to provide us with your comments. We certainly enjoy hearing the feedback of our guests as it allows us to continuously make improvements to our resort. Most of all, we are glad to know that you found our staff accommodating and friendly. We are happy to hear that you enjoyed your stay and location of our resort.  Laguna Shores Management

Summary: Small, sweet rooms, cute little kitchens, superb location right across from Heisler Park. You can watch sun rise and set from the ocean view studios (not all the studios have ocean views). I think if you had binoculars you might be able to watch whales and dolphins from the veranda. We adore it here, and come every year. You might not like it if you get a room near the highway, or if the noise of pedestrians from the park, and garbage trucks, street sweepers etc. bothers you, but really the beauty of the amazing location just sweeps those concerns away for us. Blocks from Las Brisas, Madison Square Garden, and the Laguna Art Museum, and walking distance of downtown Laguna. Bring a picnic, a bathing suit and a good attitude, and just sink into the beauty.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to provide us with your comments of your stay with The Laguna Shores. It certainly sounds like you had a great time.  We are happy to hear that you enjoyed our accommodations and amenities. We enjoy hearing from our guests and their feedback about our property. We could not agree more with your comment about the resort being in a superb location as the beauty of the ocean is just footsteps away in addition to the local attractions. We are extremely overjoyed to know that we exceed your expectations. We look forward to your return soon.  Laguna Shores Management

Summary: Wonderful location. The hotel is located across from the beach.  There is a park with a great path to walk along with amazing views of the ocean. Short walk to restaurants and shopping.  If don't want to walk there is a free trolley. Room has a beach feel. Full kitchen.  My room had a Murphy bed.  It was super comfy but if that bugs you you may want to upgrade.  I could sit on my couch and see the ocean.  I thought it was a good deal,$89, for what I got....a relaxing 3 days!!
Manager Response: Thank you for your wonderful and kind comments regarding your recent stay with us. We are very pleased that you enjoyed the accommodations and the location of the resort. Please be sure to come and visit with us again soon – it’s great to relax! As we are fond of saying, if you like to have fun with your family, come to Laguna Shores, your friends are already here!  Laguna Shores Management

Summary: My husband's family has owned a timeshare here for most of his life.  For the last 9 years, we have been coming with our children.  We just got back from our last visit two days ago.  What a great time we had.  First off, this location is ideal, right next to Heisler Park and a short walk to Main Beach and the town. The complex is clean and well maintained for a beach property.  I did have problems with the dishwasher leaking, but they came and fixed it immediately. Every unit we have stayed in has been slightly different, so it pays to ask alot of questions when booking. There are several units that do not have views, and can be quite hot in the summer.  We love that the resort has free popcorn and ice cream on certain days and times, as well as other planned activities.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for all of the wonderful things you had to say about our resort. We love hearing from our guests and owners that they had a terrific time while they were here with us. We sincerely hope that you will be joining us for years to come and that every thing continues to be pleasant with your stay.  As you are aware, we will be undergoing renovations next fall included in this will be new couches, which will include a new pull out bed. After the renovations are complete we hope that your stay here with us will be even more wonderful. And we look forward to seeing you for years to come.   Susan McCollum Resort Manager

Summary: I booked this because I had a meeting in Laguna Beach. It is a tiny complex of bungalows and gardens. I bet it was build in the twenties. Anyway, I just loved it. You can't beat the location across from Heisler Park with amazing views of the of the dramatic coastline. I walked everywhere and enjoyed the town and local fare. It is quiet and away from the busy, sometimes loud main beach. I would go again and park my car and never use it. It is a delightful little cup of tea.
Manager Response: We thank you very much for your recent review, and we appreciate the discerning “eye” you have focused on the many details that make Laguna Shores “in demand” and very, very special. As you aptly point out, three of the more important features of Laguna Shores are, in no particular order: 1) Location 2) Location and 3) Location. Your estimation as to the age of the project is equally accurate, as portions of our beloved facility do in fact date to the first half of the twentieth century. We hope you will share your kind comments about your experiences at the resort with your acquaintances, it is our hope that they will be as pleased when they visit with us as you have been. As we are fond of saying: If you like to have fun with your family, come to Laguna Shores, your friends are already here. Thank you!  Laguna Shores Management

Summary: Only if a hotel is on the sand, could it beat this spot.  Laguna Shores is actually a timeshare, converted from kitchenette rentals years ago. There are rentals available when an owner doesn't show up or puts it in the rental pool. There are one bedrooms, plus large and small studios. Its a collection of several 2-story buildings. The 1-bedroom and large studios are fairly roomy and have full kitchens.  The units are clean and the staff surely love working here. There is a pool and hot spa. The ocean views from the Cliff Drive-fronting units are spectacular.  These overlook Cliff Dr., Heisler Park - and the ocean.  That's it. The park has many walkways, picnic tables & BBQs and several stairways down to the beautiful beach and tidepools. And views of Laguna's famous cove
Manager Response: It was so nice to hear all of the wonderful things you had to say about our resort. We here at Laguna Shores are very pleased to hear that your stay here with us was nothing less than fantastic. We look forward to having you stay here with us many times over and hope to provide you with amazing getaways, no matter how far away from home you are.   Susan McCollum Resort Manager Laguna Shores

Summary: Location is huge, both the complex & your unit.  I have been a timeshare owner at Laguna Shores for many years and have been visiting Laguna Shores for over 20 years.     The location of the complex is fantastic.  Steps away from the ocean.  It's only a couple blocks (easy walking distance) to downtown Laguna with lots of restaurants & activities.   The staff is great.  The place is immaculate.  I love it!  Now the negatives - not many.  The units are small & the building is old.  So if you want something new, large & modern you will not be happy.  The units look a bit tired.  Everything is exceptionally clean & updated but it is old.  I don't see this as a negative, but others might.    (Note: A major remodel is in the works for next year that should help.)   My only real pet
Manager Response: none

Summary: I have stayed at Laguna Shores many times.  This property is in a fantastic location.  Heisler Park is right across the street with the most wonderful crooked tree!  I had my picture taken there as a child and both my children have had pictures taken there.  Laguna beach is a picturesque paradise overlooking the ocean.  The office staff was very helpful and pleasan during our stay.  They went out of their way to make our stay pleasant.  All the units have a fully equipped kitchen with everything you need to cook in and serve your meals if you so desire.  Typically we've stayed in a condo at Laguna Shores with large corner windows looking out at the coastline.  On our last trip here we booked through another company and was able to stay in the roof top condo (used to be the
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: An Enviable View and Lots to Do!
Summary: I love staying at Laguna Shores. This property is located across the street from the very popular Heisler Park with its recently re-landscaped grounds and beautiful walkways overlooking the ocean. and offering new access points to the beach.  The lobby is cheerful and features a tropical motif which is carried through the room decor. We were warmly greeted and assisted during our one-week stay. The unit had a fully equipped kitchen with everything we needed to cook and serve meals when we chose to eat in. The living/sleeping area of our "single" style unit also had a nice size flat screen tv with DVD and video tape player. Our condo had a "million dollar" view of the Heisler Park, a long sweep of the coastline and the ocean framed beautifully by the park's mature landscaping.
Manager Response: none

Summary: We booked our "condo" 6 months in advance. We were told that we'd have a king bed as we requested. When I asked about parking, I was told that each condo had one parking space each. When we arrived, the woman at the counter told us our room had a king bed. Our parking was not on the premises, but one block away. Upon entering the condo, we discovered that we did not have a king bed, but a queen. The woman at the counter had the gall to argue that the bed was a king. I ended up measuring the bed to prove to her the difference between a king and queen bed. Lastly, we were told that we had a very nice condo. Well our very nice condo was located on the roof where other guests parked their cars. The condo was on a street corner where we got to listen to the wonderful sounds of
Manager Response: I wanted to be sure to extend my sincerest apologies for any miscommunication or misunderstanding regarding this booking. We strive to ensure that all of our guests have an enjoyable stay and it is discouraging to see that your stay was not as pleasant as we would have hoped.   	As this reservation was made through a booking engine not directly related to Laguna Shores, I would like to point out that our resort did not make any specific promises or guarantees regarding room assignments, bed type or parking availability. While we do offer on-site parking for most of our suites, due to space limitations we are forced to accommodate one suite with complimentary parking off-site, which is located only half a block away from Laguna Shores. 	 	If the resort had been contacted directly prior to this reservation, we would have informed you that suite assignments for rentals cannot ever be guaranteed prior to check-in, and as stated on our website, each one bedroom suite comes equipped with either a king or queen sized bed. I will be sure to follow up with the employee who had provided this misinformation to guarantee that she is well-informed on this policy. In addition, I will be contacting the vacation company that you had booked your reservation through; to make sure they are they are relaying accurate information and not making any false or misleading promises.  	If you have any questions or concerns, please feel free to contact me directly at the resort. My number is [--]. I would be more than happy to discuss your experience with you and extend a sincere apology for the unpleasant experience you encountered.

Summary Heading: I lost my beautiful cross, but someone's honesty was so appreciated.
Summary: I spent the day out and we had several stops, when suddenly I reached  to touch my cross, as I do frequently.  I wore it for several years, and it was beauifully designed of 14k filligree gold with a single diamond chip,   I have never found another, quite as unique and beautiful.  So as you can imagine I was just sick that when I reached for it is was not around my neck.  I looked everywhere I could think of, and it was just gone.   The following day, to the beach, and upon returning to our room at Laguna Shores, and walking towards the bathroom, I was utterly astonished to see my beautiful cross hanging as if displayed on the side of my suitcase!  Some kind soul had evidently found it while cleaning our room and placed it / hung it on the suitcase, where it was sure to be
Manager Response: Thank you so much for your review, Ms. Hershner; I am very pleased to hear that you were able to enjoy your stay and I will pass along your kind words to the Housekeeping Team! We look forward to seeing you again soon!

Summary Heading: The most beautiful view I have ever taken in, was looking out the window!!!
Summary: I stayed with my cousin.  Accommadations were on the 2nd floor.  We were able to leave the windows open and smell the ocean, hear the crashing waves, it was fantastic!!!
Manager Response: none

Summary: I've stayed at this property three times total with a relative who "owns" one of these time-share condominiums. The first two times -- in the late '90s and in 2004 --  and I didn't notice any glaring issues. That wasn't the case with this most recent visit, however.   For starters, the entire complex is showing its age. It just screams 1970s! Aside from the grounds themselves,  which are beautifully maintained landscape-wise, I noticed a lot of chipped and peeling paint on building exteriors and stair railings. The complex just feels old and outdated.   Inside our unit was where my biggest concerns were: The place still has "popcorn" ceilings, and the paint on the walls and ceiling looked really dingy. There was A LOT of built-up grime on surfaces in the room: The couch,
Manager Response: none

Summary: The location of this resort is perfect.Just retuned from a week and had a wonderful stay.I was within walking distance to downtown the beaches and restaurants.Just far enough from town to be really quiet and relaxing.The staff were very helpful in planning my daytrips.Rooms are a little dated,but kept up very well.Rooms were cleaned daily.The resort sits directly across the street from a local park.The landscaping is absolutely superb.You can actually see Catalina Island on a clear day.Overall,this is a very nice place.I will definitely stay there again in the future.
Manager Response: none

Summary: We stayed a week, it was the most perfect beach trip. Our room was facing the ocean, the housekeeping staff was above and beyond great. They had a fun little Fourth of July luncheon for the guest. We had a short walk to the ocean, and the city had a free trolley to get around. I will always go back here. It is the best place I have ever stayed in Laguna. The grounds were so neat and orderly. The managers really take care of this property.
Manager Response: none

Summary: We have been going to Laguna Shores for over 28 years. The location is very nice but in July it can be very crowded which we are used to. Last year, we suffered from lack of air conditioning but this year, it was comfortable. The pool lawn chairs had their finish worn off and our windows and screens were very dirty. The bed linens were thin and old. The garden areas were still beautiful and the side walks are clean. We had difficulty parking on the roof with our larger car and it's hard to drive down the driveway with other large cars blocking drive ways, we scratched our rental car bumper due to being blocked by a large truck on the roof.  It's a lovely area but it's not like it used to be.
Manager Response: none
